00012 const char* _fieldnames[] = {"cameraMatrix1", "distCoeffs1", "cameraMatrix2",
00013     "distCoeffs2", "R", "T", "E", "F", "d"};
00015 mxArray* valueStruct(const Mat& cameraMatrix1, const Mat& distCoeffs1,
00016     const Mat& cameraMatrix2, const Mat& distCoeffs2, const Mat& R,
00017     const Mat& T, const Mat& E, const Mat& F, const double& d)
00018 {
00019     mxArray* p = mxCreateStructMatrix(1,1,9,_fieldnames);
00020     if (!p)
00021         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Allocation error");
00022     mxSetField(p,0,"cameraMatrix1",MxArray(cameraMatrix1));
00023     mxSetField(p,0,"distCoeffs1",MxArray(distCoeffs1));
00024     mxSetField(p,0,"cameraMatrix2",MxArray(cameraMatrix2));
00025     mxSetField(p,0,"distCoeffs2",MxArray(distCoeffs2));
00026     mxSetField(p,0,"R",MxArray(R));
00027     mxSetField(p,0,"T",MxArray(T));
00028     mxSetField(p,0,"E",MxArray(E));
00029     mxSetField(p,0,"F",MxArray(F));
00030     mxSetField(p,0,"d",MxArray(d));
00031     return p;
00032 }
00033 
00035 template <typename T>
00036 vector<vector<Point_<T> > > MxArrayToVecVecPt(MxArray& arr)
00037 {
00038     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00039     vector<vector<Point_<T> > > vvp;
00040     vvp.reserve(va.size());
00041     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00042     {
00043         vector<MxArray> v = (*it).toVector<MxArray>();
00044         vector<Point_<T> > vp;
00045         vp.reserve(v.size());
00046         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator jt=v.begin(); jt<v.end(); ++jt)
00047             vp.push_back((*jt).toPoint_<T>());
00048         vvp.push_back(vp);
00049     }
00050     return vvp;
00051 }

00054 template <typename T>
00055 vector<vector<Point3_<T> > > MxArrayToVecVecPt3(MxArray& arr)
00056 {
00057     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00058     vector<vector<Point3_<T> > > vvp;
00059     vvp.reserve(va.size());
00060     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00061     {
00062         vector<MxArray> v = (*it).toVector<MxArray>();
00063         vector<Point3_<T> > vp;
00064         vp.reserve(v.size());
00065         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator jt=v.begin(); jt<v.end(); ++jt)
00066             vp.push_back((*jt).toPoint3_<T>());
00067         vvp.push_back(vp);
00068     }
00069     return vvp;
00070 }

00080 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00081                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00082 {
00083     // Check the number of arguments
00084     if (nrhs<4 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>1)
00085         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00086     
00087     // Argument vector
00088     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00089     
00090     vector<vector<Point3f> > objectPoints = MxArrayToVecVecPt3<float>(rhs[0]);
00091     vector<vector<Point2f> > imagePoints1 = MxArrayToVecVecPt<float>(rhs[1]);
00092     vector<vector<Point2f> > imagePoints2 = MxArrayToVecVecPt<float>(rhs[2]);
00093     Size imageSize = rhs[3].toSize();
00094     Mat cameraMatrix1 = Mat::eye(3,3,CV_32FC1), distCoeffs1;
00095     Mat cameraMatrix2 = Mat::eye(3,3,CV_32FC1), distCoeffs2;
00096     TermCriteria termCrit(TermCriteria::COUNT+TermCriteria::EPS, 30, 1e-6);
00097     bool fixIntrinsic=true;
00098     bool useIntrinsicGuess=false;
00099     bool fixPrincipalPoint=false;
00100     bool fixFocalLength=false;
00101     bool fixAspectRatio=false;
00102     bool sameFocalLength=false;
00103     bool zeroTangentDist=false;
00104     bool fixK1=false;
00105     bool fixK2=false;
00106     bool fixK3=false;
00107     bool fixK4=false;
00108     bool fixK5=false;
00109     bool fixK6=false;
00110     bool calibRationalModel=false;    
00111     // Option processing
00112     for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00113         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00114         if (key=="CameraMatrix1")
00115             cameraMatrix1 = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00116         else if (key=="DistCoeffs1")
00117             distCoeffs1 = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00118         else if (key=="CameraMatrix2")
00119             cameraMatrix2 = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00120         else if (key=="DistCoeffs2")
00121             distCoeffs2 = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00122         else if (key=="TermCrit")
00123             termCrit = rhs[i+1].toTermCriteria();
00124         else if (key=="FixIntrinsic")
00125             fixIntrinsic = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00126         else if (key=="UseIntrinsicGuess")
00127             useIntrinsicGuess = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00128         else if (key=="FixPrincipalPoint")
00129             fixPrincipalPoint = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00130         else if (key=="FixFocalLength")
00131             fixFocalLength = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00132         else if (key=="FixAspectRatio")
00133             fixAspectRatio = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00134         else if (key=="SameFocalLength")
00135             sameFocalLength = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00136         else if (key=="ZeroTangentDist")
00137             zeroTangentDist = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00138         else if (key=="FixK1")
00139             fixK1 = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00140         else if (key=="FixK2")
00141             fixK2 = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00142         else if (key=="FixK3")
00143             fixK3 = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00144         else if (key=="FixK4")
00145             fixK4 = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00146         else if (key=="FixK5")
00147             fixK5 = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00148         else if (key=="FixK6")
00149             fixK6 = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00150         else if (key=="RationalModel")
00151             calibRationalModel = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00152         else
00153             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00154     }
00155     int flags = ((fixIntrinsic) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_INTRINSIC : 0) |
00156         ((useIntrinsicGuess) ? CV_CALIB_USE_INTRINSIC_GUESS : 0) |
00157         ((fixPrincipalPoint) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_PRINCIPAL_POINT : 0) |
00158         ((fixFocalLength) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_FOCAL_LENGTH : 0) |
00159         ((fixAspectRatio) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_ASPECT_RATIO : 0) |
00160         ((sameFocalLength) ? CV_CALIB_SAME_FOCAL_LENGTH : 0) |
00161         ((zeroTangentDist) ? CV_CALIB_ZERO_TANGENT_DIST : 0) |
00162         ((fixK1) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_K1 : 0) |
00163         ((fixK2) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_K2 : 0) |
00164         ((fixK3) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_K3 : 0) |
00165         ((fixK4) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_K4 : 0) |
00166         ((fixK5) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_K5 : 0) |
00167         ((fixK6) ? CV_CALIB_FIX_K6 : 0) |
00168         ((calibRationalModel) ? CV_CALIB_RATIONAL_MODEL : 0);
00169     
00170     // Process
00171     Mat R, T, E, F;
00172     double d = stereoCalibrate(objectPoints, imagePoints1, imagePoints2,
00173         cameraMatrix1, distCoeffs1, cameraMatrix2, distCoeffs2,
00174         imageSize, R, T, E, F, termCrit, flags);
00175     plhs[0] = valueStruct(cameraMatrix1, distCoeffs1, cameraMatrix2,
00176         distCoeffs2, R, T, E, F, d);
00177 }
